casebody.data:
SUNNYBROOK GOLF BOWL & MOTEL, INC., Petitioner-Appellant,
v.
CITY OF STERLING HEIGHTS, Respondent-Appellee. SC: 157056
COA: 332357 Supreme Court of Michigan. July 29, 2019

Order

On order of the Court, the motion for reconsideration of this Court's April 19, 2019 order is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that reconsideration of our previous order is warranted. MCR 7.311(G).
